iati-activity.iati-identifier: XI-IATI-law22.1999-XI-IATI-law22.1999-XI-IATI-law22.1999-XI-IATI-law22.1999-XI-IATI-law22.1999-XI-IATI-KHF-3.Advocacy and Media campaign and partnership network-3.1-Y2

title.narrative: 3. Advocacy and Media campaign and partnership network: 3.1 lobbying and negotiating

description.narrative:
3.1.1 Information session to raise awareness amongst the community on GBV and stipulations in the marriage contract. The sessions will be held with 12 women CBOs recommended by partners including the network of JNCW. The sessions will inform CBOs about the marriage contract, GBV services and referral mechanisms. During the sessions the marriage contract template and explanation of all optional stipulation will be shared with the CBOs to engage a strong base of supporters and organizational allies to encourage change and counter opposition or indifference.
The marriage contract template has still to be designed, any information sessions at the grassroots level would depend on the date of completion and access to the contract, the information sessions will be started on the 3rd year of the project.
3.1.2 Advocacy meetings and roundtables with key stakeholders for the discussion and development of the marriage contract template and guide will be conducted. This series of meetings will be for 12 months.
Advocacy meetings and roundtables with key stakeholders for the discussion was not implemented in year 2 due to delays in the research, however is starting in January 2022 of Year 3.
